articles.title: Google’s experimental ‘smart braid’ headphone wire controls music with a squeeze - The Verge
articles.description: Google has always had a penchant for weird user interfaces. It’s latest is the “I/O braid,” which uses touch-sensitive yarns and machine learning to register users touch. It’s only a prototype for now, but it could let you control your smart speaker or headph…
articles.content:

Its just a prototype for now.

articles.title: Meet 90-year-old Hamako Mori, the world's oldest video game YouTuber - CNN

articles.title: ​Honda Civic Breaks Record By Going From 0 To 60mph In 1.1 Seconds - LADbible
articles.description: The car broke the AWD Honda quarter-mile record at the Haltech World Cup Finals a few months back
articles.content:
A Honda Civic has broken records by travelling 0-60mph in just 1.1 seconds during a quarter-mile run at the Haltech World Cup Finals.
The car broke the AWD (All-Wheel Drive) Honda quarter-mile record at Maryland International Raceway at the event a few month… [+2101 chars]
